attributes.Ambience: {'touristy': False, 'hipster': False, 'romantic': False, 'divey': False, 'intimate': False, 'trendy': None, 'upscale': False, 'classy': False, 'casual': True}

text: The pizza is very good and the cheese fries are excellent.  Most of all I really appreciate the delivery guys who are personable and hilarious.

Just ordered a large pie for lunch. It got here in 15 min. It was cut in 6 instead of 8. But I'm most disappointed that this pie was definitely cooked last night. It's not even possible to get a pie cooked and delivered in 15min. It did taste really good though even though it was cold. So there is that.
Always consistent and delicious! Especially with ordering delivery, everything comes correct and the food is always hot. Will continue eating here!
Honestly, this place is really good!! You can tell their sauce is homemade- it's fresh and delicious...Highly reccomend the Margherita pizza and the eggplant parm!
One of my fave places to get pizza delivered from. The traditional pie doesn't disappoint and their speciality pies are great - especially the white pies. I love the one with potatoes on it!

Got an order of 2 meatballs and a large half cheese/half pepp pizza. 

From the first bite, the meatballs were amazing. Needed to be warmed up, but the flavor was so great I didn't even mind. the pizza crust was a great texture and thickness, with a good ratio of cheese and toppings. I could not stop eating the slices! Had to give some to a friend to save myself some calories. If I didn't have so many more pizza places to try in the neighborhood, I would definitely be eating Pesto every time I wanted Italian. Can't wait to try more toppings and appetizers as soon as I can though!

Worst wings ever!!!! The pizza is not good either. 

The wings are dry and flavorless, sitting in a pool of oil. The pizza was folded onto itself and the cheese is tough and chewy. 

I don't know why I chose 2 stars, I guess it's more like 1.5.

Our family has someone with celiac, and this place has safe gluten free pizza for her. That's huge! I think the regular food is okay but not amazing. I like the potato salad they serve with all (almost all) dine in orders. Obviously now it is all takeout or delivery.
Food is good  but the wait time is ridiculous. I waited over 2 hours the last 2X just for 2 pizzas and wings

What's 25 miles between our favorite spot. Just picked up salad, rolls and eggplant parmigiana. As usual good food, picked up on time. Can't wait till we can eat in. Thanks Claudio and Jen for staying safe and feeding the public. If you haven't tried the food do so, Mangia Mangia.
Just got two pies delivered. A plain with meatball, and the white pie with potato and sausage.  Soooo good. They never disappoint.  Great food, service and delivery and a really nice family too!!!

I am a big fan of Pesto.  Last night was my first time trying Pizzeria Pesto. I had three kinds of pizza, Margherita, Upside down Tomatoe Pie, and Grandma's. They were all delicious.  The sauce is great!
What impressed me most was the service.   On Grub Hub the Grandma's pizza is not listed, so it was a little confusing. I ordered the Upside down thinking it was the Grandma's so I was disappointed. The manager delivered a Grandma's pie free of charge; which I was grateful. The funny thing is, the Upside down Tomatoe Pie mistake was my favorite. Thank you and I will def be ordering again?
Linda
Delivered my food to the wrong house, even though I triple checked and in the app my address is correct -- only know Bc the people who got it reached out to me since my number was on the receipt.

A friend and I were excited to try the gnocchi at Ristorante Pesto, but found out they don't accept walk ins (sad face!). The hostess suggested dining at their sister company, Pizzeria Pesto, next door. Although they do not have gnocchi, we were not disappointed - the food was delicious! The pasta dishes are large serving sizes and accompanied with bread and a side salad. I've since ordered several times for pick up. The creamy pesto ravioli is definitely my favorite so far!

Are you kidding me! Love the restaurant pesto but the pizza place next door..... what a joke. Decent food, quality ingredients,  but over a freaking hour for a thin tiny 12" pizza??? No!! FUCK THAT!!!

The pesto sauce here is of course amazing, i personally think it tastes best on the gnocchi. The best buffalo chicken pizza I ever had was from here, they use good quality chicken on the pizza. Would recommend this place to people looking for a good delivery or take out meal. The prices for everything a great for the quality of food as well. Will definitely be ordering delivery from here frequently.

My order said it would be delivered between 1014 and 1035 when I ordered before 9 o'clock. my food arrived at 919. don't be deterred by the inaccurate delivery time! as for the pizza itself it was decent. crust could have used more time to crisp up but it tasted pretty good. it was also much cheaper than most gluten free pies. not my absolute go to but for the price and speed of delivery i'm definitely satisfied

square pie is great. Fresh bread with the salads
 Qualilty really shows. Im not hesitant to order anything off the menu. I know it will be good
This place makes some good ass pizza! Pizza was so good that I had to call people from upstairs to come downstairs just to taste perfection. Haha.

After reading all the good reviews, I went on to place an order for 1 large pizza, 10 buffalo wings, and a large fry. 

Buffalo wings was trash (undercooked), but the pizza made up for it. 

Delivery driver was disrespectful. I ordered through Yelp and tipped in advance, so I couldn't take it back.

Pizzeria pesto is great. They have plenty of options such as pasta, chicken parm dinner or sandwich, and many different kinds of pizzas. They also have a large sitting area that is very cute and Italian themed inside. The owners are great and always make sure to say hi. Prices are not bad at all. It's a great place to check out if You are in the city for a show or anything. I love their blush penne. Add a little red pepper flakes and it's fabulous!

Crispy yet chewy good flavor on the margherita pizza sauce was pretty good. bacon chicken ranch pizza was not great chicken was flavorless. Fries were floppy but had a chew to it, lukewarm at best. Pizzas werent ice cold but not warm either. Temperature may be due to delivery from grub hub. Overall lackluster experience but that may be attributed to temp of food

My goto for Grubhub, they always deliver. Their pizza is delicious and chewy, sauce has lots of good flavor. 

I also usually get wings, mozzarella sticks, and fries. All very solid options to order from!

Would recommend for those in South Philadelphia and beyond.

Table of 8..Pizza was SOGGY and took a long time to be served, half the table ate their food before the other half got served. Had to chase down the waitress for beverages refills multiple times. Mom had to eat dessert with all the dirty dishes on the table, very disappointing. Poor service and mediocre food.
One of the best pies in the city! The margarita is so fresh. I order the smallest size and it's enough for 2 people. Only $11 with tip and delivery fee. Keep up the good work !

Wow.......This place is amazing. I never leave reviews but I just had to after that meal. We got the potato pizza and a chicken parm sandwich. I didn't really have high hopes for the pizza (never had potato on pizza) So I figured a chicken parm was a safe backup. I don't know where to start. We added onions to the pizza (excellent choice) but it would have been delicious without. One of the best pizzas I've ever had. I said the chicken parm was a safe pick. But in reality I haven't had a great one in awhile. Either too much bread, over toasted, barely any cheese, one slice of chicken, soggy from being drenched in sauce. They hit a home run.  This was the absolute perfect chicken parm sandwich. Packed with chicken, good amount of cheese, bread was crispy but when you bite it nothing falls out. Oh and delivery estimate was a hr and the driver knocked on my door maybe 25 mins after ordering. I'd give ten stars if I could.
My FAVORITE pizza spot in the city. Closest thing to a NY slice. Timely delivery and affordable. I love this place. No longer open on Mondays

We enjoyed the crispiness of their thin crust, as well as the sweet / spicy pizzazz  pizza. The Ambiance inside was very nice, and we will definitely be returning for another visit! 
They also deliver pizzas, so we are happy they're in the neighborhood. Reasonably priced and well worth it!
Favorite pizza in the city! Delivery is alway on time and the food is always hot, fresh and delicious.
My FAVORITE pizza spot in the city. Closest thing to a NY slice. Timely delivery and affordable. I love this place.

Just had dinner here.   It was superb.   The server was fantastic.   She was not only polite, was knowledgeable about the food.   I had the short ribs to order and my husband had the pork chop.  We had salad and garlic knots with maranaria sauce.

We've ordered delivery a couple times now and both times we loved it! The Chicken Parm and spaghetti with meatballs are both excellent. The portions are good and it comes with bread plus a small salad. We've also tried a calzone which was huge (we ordered the large) and it was amazing! Glad we found this spot and see us ordering here often. The delivery guy was super nice and the prices are great!

So I never write reviews on places but this might be the worst food I've ever gotten delivered. The pizza sauce was horrible. We couldn't even pick up the slice of pizza cuz all the toppings fell off. I ordered pepperoni & sausage on the whole pizza and then mushroom and onion on half. I got half with pepperoni and sausage even though I payed for the whole pizza price topping and then the other half had only mushroom and onion. The wings were undercooked. I won't be ordering from this place again.

It  took two hours for delivery ( 15 minutes more than outside estimate ) and the food was cold. It's too bad because the pizza would've been very good otherwise.  How do you warm up an arugula pizza???  The hoagie bread was very good but the dressing was more vinegar than anything else and hoagie was a little soggy.  Pick would probably be good but delivery doesn't cut it.

dont use heated box thingys? it's the coldest night in years and years....plus i waited almost 2. yes 2 hours! and its not the kick butt pizza it should be......well, never again. i could have walked there and home faster

We ordered three pies for delivery on a busy Saturday night (plain, pepperoni, and a multi-topping GF). All three were delicious - INCLUDING the gluten free pie, which was a nice surprise. Delivery came in less time than estimated. Will definitely order again!

Two hours and five minutes after ordering, my food finally arrived...at the house next door. On a Tuesday evening with wonderful weather...

Men have literally run marathons faster.

"Two Cold Calzones...$30+...microwave not provided"

This is my favorite pizza take out in Philadelphia. I grew up in central jersey and lived in nyc, let me tell you...it is not easy to find a decent pie in Philadelphia. At all. This plain pie is excellent. Does it heat up well? No. But hopefully, you will finish it all before that needs to happen.

The pizzas here are phenomenal. Had a quick order of the margheritas and boy oh boy were they juicy! I'd support the wings but they could be better, feels like they have the potential for it. Love it and as I speak I ordered again and giving a massive tip cause I missed tipping last time
You can't go wrong getting pizza from here.  I love the sauce and the crust and have tried many of he toppings.  They just know how to make a pizza.

This is probably my new go-to pizza spot. Delivery on a Saturday night was surprisingly quick. We got a standard white pizza and the garlic was a bit overpowering for me, but right up my husband's alley. 

The Antipasto salad came with huge slices of meat and cheese that I wish would have been chopped up a bit, but no big deal.

Will order from here again!

First time in this Pizzeria at it was delicious!!! For starters they bring out garlic knots with a side of potato salad. Not your usual potato salad it has oil and pesto very good. There mozzarella sticks are great. The pizza was fantastic we ordered a plain and their cheesesteak one both were really great. I would totally go there again.
Our favorite spot for pizza and sometimes specials. Good food, great salads, sociable staff and delivery personnel. Their specials are good as well.

Got a plain cheese pizza and it was okay. 

My pizza took over and hour to arrive. Not sure if this was the shop or the drivers fault.

Took a whole hour for 1 pizza and it's cold and gross.
They said anymore then 1 hour and it's free
The guy shows up in no lie 59:57 on the count down.
So I'm stuck with this cold half assed pizza i don't even want now. 
Shoulda just went with Chinese
Cheesesteaks are AMAZING. Skip the tourist traps with subpar steaks like pats and genos and go to this place. The rolls are seriously outstanding!
Awesome food grest service a true philly best. Crust banging white pizza great potato salad great.

I have no idea how this place got good ratings.  The pizza crust was like cardboard & the cheese was a mess. Waste of money. Never again

UPDATED: however, it was excellent 2nd day pizza! If I order again, I'll wait to the next day to eat it
I have no idea how this place got good ratings.  The pizza crust was like cardboard & the cheese was a mess. Waste of money. Never again

Mediocre. I mean it gets the job done, and it's not bad, but it's just not that good. I asked for it well done, and ever though it was cooked 'well done', it was still soggy. The cheese was a bit chewy, the sauce watery, and overall a bit flavorless. I've been searching for the best pizza in my area and my search continues.
